explanation: [0-0] A little girl with long hair, wearing a yellow dress, is holding a spoon in her right hand. She is sitting in front of a white table with a pink bowl of food on it. The bowl is placed on a blue cloth. Behind the little girl, there is a pink background and a brown sofa.
[0-2] Then the little girl stirs the food in the bowl with a spoon. The bowl tips over, spilling the food onto the table. The little girl then sets the bowl upright.
